entities.description: Fluffy is mentioned as an obstacle that Harry and his friends need to get past.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is the main character who suddenly jumps up and decides to go see Hagrid.

entities.name: ron
entities.description: Ron is Harry's friend who is sleepy and doesn't understand what Harry is talking about.

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Hermione is another one of Harry's friends who hurries to keep up with him as he rushes to see Hagrid.

entities.name: hagrid
entities.description: Hagrid is a gamekeeper at Hogwarts who has been wanting a dragon and a stranger turns up with an egg in his pocket.

entities.name: dragon
entities.description: A dragon is mentioned as something that Hagrid wants more than anything else.

entities.name: egg
entities.description: An egg is mentioned as being in the stranger's pocket.

entities.name: stranger
entities.description: A stranger turns up with an egg in his pocket and it seems suspicious to Harry.
